description: Deku Scrubs weeded out the Underlings with the least useful features for their jobs. Over time those who could gather nuts faster than others were the ones allowed to live.
tooltip: Deku Scrubs weeded out the Underlings with the least useful features for their jobs. Over time those who could gather nuts faster than others were the ones allowed to live. (Doubles the gther rate of Fruit, Grains, and Meganuts)
